title: 2017 Doublewide Manufactured 3 Bedroom Home For Rent
app_fee: Community Application fee based on number of adults on application.
posting_body: Enjoy the comfort of your own space at Oakland Glens, a well-maintained, professionally managed manufactured home community.
Oakland Glens is located on the Novi and Walled Lake border, giving you direct access to so many great local offerings!
Public access to Walled Lake, shopping, dining and entertainment options all located with just a few miles.
Right now, you could rent a 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home with 1568 sq feet of space in a highly sought after location.
This home will not be available long!
Call Sales today and mention site #248!!
